p.k: Gherkins and Chablis from the Auxerre region
p.d: Vincent Dampt is a winegrower in the Auxerrois, the very heart of Burgundy, where he produces one of the most famous French white wines: Chablis. Henri Jeannequin and his father Florent are amongst the last gherkin producers in France. Guy Martin proposes a menu of Chablis-marinated gherkins and salad. Presented by: Guy Martin.
